From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>



* Carnage sighed...*

" I could care less if you knew my maiden name, the point is still that at 
least you have something to call me. And could you give me a name to call 
you that isn't insulting?"

* Carnage snarled as she jumped over a log and landed in a deep puddle that 
led out into a swamp, she looked at it. Moss covered, blanketed in mist and 
green water, it reminded her of the swamp that she had landed in. Her home.
She sighed again and continued to travel along, it was strange to have a 
clone as one of their traveling party now. But, right now she could care 
less, the thought of hearing Megatron's screams was all that she thought 
about. How thrilling it would be to have the killer of her best friend dead, 
how satisfying it would feel!
Carnage growled but then smiled...*

" Do you think that it's possible to leave a little of that tin tyrant for 
me, or at least let me get in a few good hits before you kill him?"

* Just then her leg seized and she dropped to the ground like a bag of 
rocks, an old wound that just wouldn't leave her alone!
Carnage fell waist deep into the swamp sludge and snarled, if it wasn't 
memories of her own torture then it was a permanent side effect of it!
She tried to stand but then fell back into the sludge, it only took one 
wound of torture to drop her...the only one that never healed properly!!
Carnage sighed and tryed relaxed her leg, the sludge was cold but it was 
slowly easing it. She stayed there and tried to relax, as long as Teltoli 
got to the Maximal base she didn't care if she was left behind...as long as 
she reached the base.*
